revision.text:
<!--모델_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Model
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 본명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 생년월일 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장소 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망일 | ontologyProperty = deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망지 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 키 | ontologyProperty = height | unit = Length }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 체중 | ontologyProperty = weight | unit = Mass }}
    	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:nick }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 배우자 | ontologyProperty = spouse }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 홈페이지 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
end}}

|신발크기=
